title: 'How Long Do I Have Left?' Algorithm Accurately Predicting Lifespans...
text:
Lloyd B. Minor is dean of the Stanford University School of Medicine. He is also a professor of otolaryngology–head and neck surgery and a professor of bioengineering and of neurobiology, by courtesy. The first patient I saw during my clinical rotations as a medical student was dying from chronic myeloid leukemia (CML). Today, with treatment, […]
